Reviews.Title: “good value for such an expensive city”
Reviews.Author: 11trav11
Reviews.Content: stayed 5 nights nov 11 change due heavy mold door patio window changed hotel little tired sufficient hours daily reasonably clean comfortable bed wellstocked operating washroom lot continental breakfast choice fresh coffee juice topnotch staff friendly helpful importantly couldnt practical location rome leisurely days walk loop spanish steps st peters piazza navona pantheon trevi fountain backand course metro block else 2star hotel theory rome pay twice price satisfied wed stay chance

Reviews.Title: “Great find in Rome”
Reviews.Author: 60MikeandLinda
Reviews.Content: thank luca team stay hotel situated near metro station via veneto hard rock cafe close embassy 10 15 minute walk trevi fountains spanish steps hotel affordable worth included breakfast nice clean person 1 bag 5th floor 502 balcony lovely stay grazie arrivederci

Reviews.Title: “A Nice Place to Stay”
Reviews.Author: Ian C Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: hotel situated excellent location near centre historic rome trevi fountain pantheon colloseum name easy walking distance stayed 5 nights thursday tuesday negative comment staff speak english nuisance couple mornings weekend major means staff reception understood helpful compliments owner staff hotel ideal stay short break rome wouldnt hesitate recommendation

Reviews.Title: “good location, good hotel”
Reviews.Author: kath91982
Reviews.Content: nights april 2011 location walked sights 20 min train street hotel clean amount space european hotel staff friendly price

Reviews.Title: “Great location! pretty good hotel”
Reviews.Author: ItalyLove001
Reviews.Content: hotel fantastic location steps via veneto short walk villa borghese walking distance attractions rome hotels lower standard lot cities italy dont lot pay size nice bathroom breakfast sweet breads cereal offered disappointed fruit yogurt start day cappuccino people front nice allow computer downstairs terrible protests outside window near government building terribly annoying 10 hours heard loud drums yelling terrible hotels fault overall romes standards nice hotel

Reviews.Title: “Good location, nice staff”
Reviews.Author: Toresansan
Reviews.Content: spent week rome beginning august 2011 girlfriend parents agreed staff friendly aided luggage lost airport kept calling airport days try arrive hotel hotel located near metro station youll connected city addition walk 1015min pantheon surrounding sights vary size depending youd pay book beds ok fantastic weeks stay ive noticed people complained bad smell spread floors bad smells time stayed fixed passing hard thoroughly enjoyed stay probably hotel visit

Reviews.Title: “City Break in the summer!”
Reviews.Author: sandy24Ireland
Reviews.Content: hotel july cosy weather rome 40 degree major help life hotel squash 2 people luggage laugh breakfast basic tea coffee fruit cereal scones etc considering lift tiny bank hotel near government buildings safe lovely staff helpful remember eat bread dinner irish uk people complimentry home fooled day charged lovely experience metro 20 walk rome

Reviews.Title: “Better than average”
Reviews.Author: R E
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights october 2011 left cruise emailed hotel times arrived leaving bags checkin flight arrived 9am rome hotel replied hotel little 10am instead leaving bags checkin notified perfect yes compared american hotels stayed city average yes tv cares rome tv sewer smell read reviews front desk helpful map walked food options staff memeber helpful hotel location walk jump metro line vatican stay

Reviews.Title: “Very Helpful and friendly staff, Good value for a charming budget hotel”
Reviews.Author: ddualba
Reviews.Content: front desk nice knowledgeable spoke english spanish looking hotel close embassy immigration returning usa able stay nights reservation price reasonable location close subway famous tourist trevi fountains spanish steps computer internet free downstairs lounge wifi internet real vacation free computer quickly checking email adequate

Reviews.Title: “Small but good for the price”
Reviews.Author: turtlers2
Reviews.Content: cant understand negative comments hotel booked hotel modigliani night desk staff family owner desk late afternoon spoke excellent english helpful attentive adequate size relatively clean remember rome talking worlds expensive stay elevator extremely person suitcase view breakfast roof breakfast fine stay front floor trouble noise internal arangements kept quiet neighbours

Reviews.Title: “Good value for price”
Reviews.Author: cc2001
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights honeymoon location street barberini metro stop metro location convenient tad piazza navona pantheon little especially bathroom adequate clean people commented smell bit musty showering little balcony cute try facing street buses garbage trucks start days service staff nice spoke excellent english reservations borghese gallery called confirm hotel reservation florence breakfast upstairs cute breakfast terrace nice spread fruit salad selection croissants pastries rolls cereals juices fresh coffees teas internet didnt realize theres computer free internet floor store luggage overall value money little nicer equivalent price couldnt close

Reviews.Title: “Great location, bad smell”
Reviews.Author: twoweeksayear
Reviews.Content: overall location price bad smell hotel location 10 minute walk trevi fountain farther pantheon spanish steps squares block subway easy rome didnt cab entire trip price 120 night stayed excellent location fine youd expect price ultimately probably wouldnt stay read tripadvisor reviews left complained sewage smell foolishly maybe summer bad march move probably air freshener luckily didnt spend time unpleasant smell keeping toilet lid shut bathroom door closed help bit sometimes wed probably cleaned smell

Reviews.Title: “Terrific budget hotel,fantastic location.”
Reviews.Author: paulburrows
Reviews.Content: booked hotel surprise birthday staying 3 nights hoped italian charm character didnt expect marriot raddison price paid suggested friendly breakfast clean serviced daily free internet luggage holding service excellent location visit rome direct bus airport termini 4 euros metro barberini 2 stops 100 yards hotel 1 euro metro station vatican collesseum 10 minute walk trevi fountain charm roman streets restaurants eateries variety prices 10 euro set menus lavish la carte taxi weekend adequate hair dryer bathroom space queen sized bed clean sheets day shower bit low pressure didnt balcony free access ceiling balcony else loo fixed hour bad sunday night 8pm parents coming rome spring recommend hotel particularly dont walk hotel thank staff owners stay

Reviews.Title: “not the best in town.......”
Reviews.Author: debsmillis
Reviews.Content: arrived rome hot tired found hotel expected entrance strange isnt word adaquate size cleanliness lot desired bathroom particular bad juliet balcony overlooking noisy road cigarette cleaned time stay

Reviews.Title: “Good little hotel”
Reviews.Author: kste22
Reviews.Content: read mixed reviews site hotel am puzzled people comment booking hotel eyes marriot sheraton le meridien travelodge holiday inn style comfortable own charming hotel stayed 5th floor confortable spacious base explore rome perfectly located 10 minutes trevi fountain spanish steps 25 min walk coloseum breakfast morning limited sit roof terrace eat relaxing unique hotel staff pleasant helpful issues cleanliness bed sheets changed everyday tv fell tired walking day door nice sandwich cafe called ginos called buy lunchtimes sandwiches everyday heading recommend hotel looking comfortable base explore quality modern elsewhere

Reviews.Content: stay impressed hoped rome seek peace found toilet hotel sits quiet street plus despite numerous stories atmosphere walked wrong hotel fit double sized bed luggage lot intended stay days television memory wooden crate addition bathrooms piece gross dirty sink toilet bathtubshower bathe amount dirt addition couldnt incredible smell feces coming bathroom filling told people staying bed bed wife child ten sleep floor knowledge deliver extra bed wouldnt able fit anyway relieved capri horrible nights running joke hotel name means 53 pieces poop

Reviews.Title: “beware of changes”
Reviews.Author: OmaArkansas
Reviews.Content: booked paid superior months advance told arrived 3 night stay leaks rain couple arrived told story move hotel paid taxi fees 2 nights insisted return night rome 3 nights spend time changing packing unpacking miraculously leak fixed night rained 2 daysnights hotel fridaysaturday figure external leaks repaired rain weekend owner transport hotel sunday morning extremely car meant 2 trips transport 4 suitcases walked 10 minutes hotel lobby desk entry finally adequate rated deluxe owner compensation shuffling deluxe id hate superior 5th floor 6 flights stairs elevator hold 2 people 1 person 1 suitcase hotel floor 2 terrace convenient location near bus metro stops cafes walking distance historical rome stay probably convenient location check

Reviews.Title: “Pleasant Stay”
Reviews.Author: kait_b
Reviews.Content: stayed june staff pleasant hotel situated walk spanish steps trevi fountain walk vatican fairly close central meeting booked day tours city found beds bit hard thats taste hotel clean tidy days stayed stay
